{"id":905748863,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1677481675,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"45 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/905748863/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"51.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        string res;\n        vector<string> zigzags(numRows, \"\");\n        int index = 0, mode = 0;\n\n        if (numRows == 1)\n            return s;\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            zigzags[index] = zigzags[index] + s[i];\n            if (mode == 0) {\n                index++;\n                if (index >= numRows) {\n                    index = numRows - 2;\n                    mode = 1;\n                }\n            } else {\n                index--;\n                if (index < 0) {\n                    index = 1;\n                    mode = 0;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (auto i = 0; i < zigzags.size(); i++) {\n            res = res + zigzags[i];\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
